name: Falling Farm
description:
Hey, your farmer friend needs your help!

He sent you a letter saying his animals wanted to swim but something went wrong, you'll have to use your old fishing boat to save all the creatures while they fall from the top of a cliff.

I'm sure you'll be able to save some of them, if you can save lots of them you might be rewarded with a delicious cake!

Have fun and don't let the poor animals drown!
